This was very annoying especially with a fast pet. I thought it might be the type of SD card but it wasn't. I tried 2 different kinds, the SanDisk SDHC Card and the SanDisk Extreme III SDHC Card. The Extreme III did not help the in between shots get any faster on this camera. Now the camera takes great pictures and has a really easy set up so if the time between shots doesn't bother you then this may be a good camera for you. The second problem I had was the LCD screen was fuzzy when there wasn't a lot of light in the room. The minute you went into a room with a lot of lights on the screen cleared up. I think this may have been a defect with the camera I got, but I am not completely sure that other A2000IS cameras do not do this. The picture would take normal it was just a fuzzy screen while trying to take a picture. That made it harder to see if everyone was smiling at the same time. I gave this camera 3 stars because I think it can be a good camera. I was just expecting more for the price and for it being a Canon. The whole reason for buying this camera was to upgrade from a Canon A 95. I wanted to get a faster time between shots and a larger LCD screen to view pictures on. This camera ended up being a downgrade from our old camera. Bottom line I returned the camera for a full refund (Amazon honored with no problems) and purchased an Olympus Stylus 1010 and I am loving it. Good luck with your camera search.

Reviews.Title: The Quiet Canon
Reviews.Author: Mark Mywird
Reviews.Content: This is my third Canon Camera and they just keep getting better.The body is still quite substantial and it looks and feels great. The 3 inch screen is one of my favorite things about it. The information is very easy to see on the screen and any adjustments are quite intuitive.The pictures are simply amazing and very easy to set up for different subjects and circumstances. you do not have to even turn on the camera to review your previously taken pictures.Closeups are awesome and crystall clear and so lifelike.I have been taking pictures for fifty years and this camera  was the most fun  yet. Oh yeah and it is Quiet. PS battery life is to short as it only holds two double AA.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: D. Mataia
Reviews.Content: I've had it for a month now. Im not completely thrilled with it. My biggest regret is how it takes couple seconds to think before it allows you take another picture. Its worse in low lighting pictures. Other than that its a very good camera.

Reviews.Title: Not so hot
Reviews.Author: D. Whitman
Reviews.Content: Good for beginner. Got good reviews from the Pros, but Manual controls very limited and I returned it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: M. Parsley "mkpwdp"
Reviews.Content: We are expecting our first baby and wanted a camera that took clear pictures but wasn't so high tech that we'd have to pull out the manual everytime we used it.  This camera is perfect for that.  The only complaint that I have is that the camera itself is plastic and feels a bit cheap.  The pictures and functionality of the camera are great.

Reviews.Title: Good digital camera
Reviews.Author: H. Perkins
Reviews.Content: Love this camera.  It is simple to operate.  The directions are clear.  I could not use the program to load pictures to my pc. I used the Mac IPhoto program instead and it is fine. I would recommend the Canon Powershot A2000IS.

Reviews.Title: canon
Reviews.Author: John N. Bechtel "John Bechtel"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. It's very easy to use and takes great pictures. I really like the zoom feature, it's size and simplicity of operation.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera !!
Reviews.Author: Brian Oehlert
Reviews.Content: I would HIGHLY reccomend this camera. It has a setting for everything and the hassle free auto mode makes picture taking a snap. I really like the professional results and the ability to use situation specific settings. This camera has it all and video too !!

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot A2000IS review..
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Burton
Reviews.Content: It's very easy to understand, takes amazing photos, there's never any blurry pictures, and it's a good price.  I'm not easily satisfied, but I looooove this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera - Amazing Resolution
Reviews.Author: Boone Helm "Reality is just an illusion albei...
Reviews.Content: If you told me 2 years I would be able to take pictures like this with a digital camera I would have told you that you were crazy. The quality of the pictures I am taking with this little point and shoot camera is amazing. The auto settings are great. It's almost not worth tweaking the settings unless you are going for a specific effect.

Reviews.Title: Great overall
Reviews.Author: Orsi Crawford "orsburg"
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use, has a huge LCD for easy viewing...great value overall, and the zoom is bigger and better than on most small digitals.  I would highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: M. Merella
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with this camera so far. I think the zoom feature is excellent & the image stabilization is a plus.

Reviews.Title: Not up to par
Reviews.Author: D. Murphy
Reviews.Content: I thought this 10 meg camera would blow my old Casio 5 meg out of the water!  Wrong.... The zoom was nice but everything else is sub par.  I returned it and purchased another cheap Casio with 8 meg.  The doulble A batteries are nice except they take a full 4-5 seconds to recharge the flash.  I am not a huge camera guy by any means.  I keep a small easy to use camera.  Pictures taken with my old Casio looked better than with this new Canon.  And yes I had it on the high resolution.  Save your money and buy a cheap little Casio for a great general purpose camera.

Reviews.Title: Creative Experience
Reviews.Author: Ben Campbell
Reviews.Content: I rate this Canon A2000IS 5 stars. Why? Digital photographic knowledge combined with technical skills. I coupled my A2000IS with a SanDisk Extreme III 4GB memory card and two Sony Ni-MH Rechargeable batteries; applied my digital photographic technical skills and the results were stunning shots. The card and batteries work together for quick results. The card will shoot 905 photos at 10Mega pixels or hold an hour of video. The batteries make all functions Daytona speed spectacles.Macro shots are explicitly clear as are the zoom shots. Even the zoom in movie mode remains clean and crisp while shooting. I took three spectacular one minute movies through Plexiglas while at the Monterey Bay Aquarium last week. The penguins and jellyfish look as if I were in clear underwater with them.All the function buttons are definitive and easy to use. I especially like the preview button. The scene modes on top of the A2000 prove effective, as does the wedge shape. It's quite unique and regal looking. I have no problem holding the camera securely without a rubber grip on the front.I like this Canon Powershot A2000IS so much I'll be purchasing the new Canon SX1 IS in April when it's released in the US market. If you purchase this camera make certain you also purchase the rechargeable batteries and a SanDisk Extreme III memory card to use in it. Take care and shoot more often.As birthday gifts to family & friends I make photo books of shots I've taken of the people. It's the perfect way of showing my love, and giving them a gift that lasts a lifetime.I'm Ben Campbell, the author of two novels, the psyche drama KISSING FREUD and the action adventure DUBROVNIK. You can preview and purchase both books here on amazon.com.

Reviews.Title: Change batteries every 5 shots
Reviews.Author: TWurts "TBW52"
Reviews.Content: From the beginning, mine only got about 5 shots before asking for new batteries. It was "repaired" under warranty, but continues to do the same thing. I have tried various batteries and have rechargeables. However, who wants to swtich batteries every 5 shots? Perhaps my particular camera is a lemon and other A2000IS are fine...but I would warn you off this one!

Reviews.Title: Camera review
Reviews.Author: Elmer J. Alexander
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera! I researched quite a bit in looking for my perfect camera. This is the one.

Reviews.Title: Too slow for indoor pictures
Reviews.Author: B. Welch
Reviews.Content: Tried the A2000IS camera and found it too slow for indoor pictures.  Nice screen, good ergonomics, but just too slow to take pictures even with the AF beam turned off.

Reviews.Title: Value for money
Reviews.Author: Amit Bajaj
Reviews.Content: Nice simple camera, provided you are interested in point n click. Value for money, in this price you get good pictures with nice image quality. However, the shutter speed is bad, there is a delay of few seconds before you click again, good amount of time to say "cheese" 3 times :-)

Reviews.Title: Great for First Camera
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Chou
Reviews.Content: got this camera on sale here, I read some of the reviews about delay and w/e. There is a 5 sec delay after every shot but the pictures are crystal clear and overall a great product! I don't think the delay is much of a problem... at least not yet haha.

Reviews.Title: Canon A2000IS Great Camera
Reviews.Author: G. Booth
Reviews.Content: Have had several digital cameras and this one is by far the best in it's price range. Steady shot is great and picture quality is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Canon A2000 is
Reviews.Author: R. Hagy
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera, all that I would expect from Canon! The size is right; balance is good and loaded with features. The zoom and AE features get the job done and it is a pleasure to carry. I'm completely satisfied and would not hesitate to recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Andrew R. Stephan
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera, and I am extremely satisfied. Canon is a great brand, very reliable, and I have never had any problems with their cameras. My mom has owned a Fujifilm digital camera for the last several years and this camera surpasses that camera in every conceivable way. The battery life is much longer, there is no lag when you press buttons or go through menu options. The flash takes a little while to charge, but it isn't too bad. This camera is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: I really like this camera
Reviews.Author: Tash
Reviews.Content: Really a four and a half stars. Lots of goodies on this one. Great optical zoom! Battery lasts a long time. Easy to use. Guys with big hands will find it easier to use than smaller pocket-sized cameras. Nice sized screen. Only real drawback is the delay after taking a shot, which makes it very difficult to take shots in rapid succession.

Reviews.Title: Generally unimpressed
Reviews.Author: Chuck Stone "Buster"
Reviews.Content: For outdoors shooting, the LCD display is inadequate. Heavy glare makes this a point-and-guess in sunlight. Otherwise image quality is OK but certainly not exceptional.

Reviews.Title: Great photos
Reviews.Author: Happy G-ma
Reviews.Content: This little camera does a great job taking photos- even with existing light.  Its relatively light weight and small, at least compared to my previous Canon and the large screen means I can take photos without finding my glasses!  I'm not very technical so this is an easy to use and rewarding camera- the photos are great!  Battery life a little short, but that's so far a small drawback for the results I'm getting in great photos.

Reviews.Title: Well Suited For Me !
Reviews.Author: C. Bertrand "Bertrandland"
Reviews.Content: This is my second digital camera and I love it so far. My uses for this camera are for three main reasons: 1. To take pictures of my grandchildren, (close ups are great!) 2.  for uploading and posting my fiber art, on my website, bertrandland.com and  3. to take nature pictures as a hobby.  The screen is nice and large. I have to be careful not to put a fingerprint on the screen when I pick it up, however, since I like to use my tri-pod, this does not happen often. Even if it does, it wipes off easily. I still have more to discover about this camera and keep my book handy. I really do like it.

Reviews.Title: One Year Later
Reviews.Author: Alliegorie "Alliegorie"
Reviews.Content: One year and three weeks after I purchased this camera it stopped working. It had been working well until this point.  The battery is fully charged.  Of course the warranty is up.  The camera won't turn on! This camera had come highly recommended and I was very satisfied with it - I had another model of Canon before this and also had problems which is what prompted me to buy this camera.  This is the last Canon I will ever purchase.  I paid $200 for it and should have gotten way more than one year out of it.

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: This camera has some nice features and does a pretty good job at what it attempts. Those that seems to have large adversity to this camera (and those that seem to love every aspect of it) should remember that it's not a $600 camera.In low light without flash the pictures are likely to be blurry because it takes longer to process the low amount of light in the area. I can also see some of the pixles when I take videos. Maybe this is a problem with my specific camera?At any rate, I think the camera is decent and does a good enough job for what I need. If you're looking for a camera that takes really good pictures all the time, then this is not the camera for you. Be prepared to work a little harder to capture the shots more with your own skills and less with the technology of the camera.

Reviews.Title: Slow charge time for flash between shots
Reviews.Author: Paulo
Reviews.Content: The pictures are great, but unfortunately the time in between shots that the camera takes to charge the flash is unbearable. It is not practical for our needs. We were not expecting DSLR speed between shots we were expecting the same time as our older Canon A95.

Reviews.Title: A2000 IS camera
Reviews.Author: John Philips
Reviews.Content: Good camera, only problem seems to be that you have to be careful not to drop because not a good place to hold on to.Order was handled very well, and arrived as expected.John P. , Oklahoma

Reviews.Title: Ease in ordering
Reviews.Author: Larry Peechatka
Reviews.Content: A good product ( this is my second Cannon) The best part is the ease of ordering and, for me, prompt delivery........

Reviews.Title: still searching
Reviews.Author: twosisters
Reviews.Content: After many months of searching, I was sure this camera was the one.  But after trying it for one day, I am disappointed.  The quality of photo and video is excellent, but it has a major delay when recharging the flash to reload (the whole reason I wanted a new camera).It is definitely disappointing to have to wait so long to see the picture you just took, and to have to wait so long to actually take another picture.It is much bigger than it appears: definately not a compact camera that's for sure. If you're looking for a small camera don't buy this one.Aside from those problems, the camera is very good, your typical cannon camera.

Reviews.Title: still getting use to it
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Vicki L. Krebs
Reviews.Content: We just got the camera and I am still trying to work it correctly. I took a lot of pictures on Vacation but have not developed any yet

Reviews.Title: really is a point &shoot;
Reviews.Author: John B. Quinlan
Reviews.Content: This camera takes very good photos. However the features advertised are absent. It is really just a point and shoot.It turns out to be OK for the pictures I take but anyone expecting more will be dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: great camera, great deal
Reviews.Author: D. Davis
Reviews.Content: camera has been everything we wanted, i definetly will use amazon for my next purchase!

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot A200 Camera
Reviews.Author: Stephen M. Parker
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera, timely processing and shipment, great pictures. Best features for the price and size.

Reviews.Title: Dont waste your money
Reviews.Author: Steven M. Zavalney
Reviews.Content: I can't believe Canon would put their name on this camera.  Poor quality, very slow response, just an all around poor performer.I purchased this based on Canon's reputation, my experience with my Canon DSLR and reviews I read here and other sites.  Maybe I just got a "lemon", but the picture quality was poorer than that of an OLD nikon point and shoot I had, with only 3 MP resolution.  Low Light?  FORGET IT!  Any kind of speed in capturing the moment?  Not likely.I would recommend buying a slightly higher priced camera, maybe it it the old processor in this model, or maybe, as I said, I just got a "lemon">  All I know is that all the pictures I tried to take on a recent "once-in-a-lifetime" trip came out poor or un-viewable.  Ruined.  And I thought that video would be a great added feature?  Nope.  Very slow, poor quality and slow response.  Only digital zoom as well, and the digital zoom is AWFUL!Save your pennies and don't waste them on this model!

Reviews.Title: Expect ot pay more
Reviews.Author: R. York
Reviews.Content: Extremely disapointed with the memory card provided with the camera. Will take about eleven pics and that's it.  Be prepared to spend another $15.00 to #20.00 for a 2 or 8GB memory card.  The 32 mb memory card that comes with the camera will allow you to take 11 pics and thats it.
